## Inplace PT Options

| Value | Label | Options | Description |
|:------|:------|:--------|:------------|
| **1** | **root** | instance: any<br/>props: InplaceProps<br/>state: InplaceState<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to pass attributes to the root's DOM element. |
| **2** | **display** | instance: any<br/>props: InplaceProps<br/>state: InplaceState<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to pass attributes to the display's DOM element. |
| **3** | **content** | instance: any<br/>props: InplaceProps<br/>state: InplaceState<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to pass attributes to the content's DOM element. |
| **4** | **hooks** | instance: any<br/>props: InplaceProps<br/>state: InplaceState<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to manage all lifecycle hooks. |
